title: Dream Theater - Live in Budokan BDRemux
description:
Dream Theater in Tokyo! (Nippon Budokan) 2004 concert, 2011 Blu-Ray release.
This is a remux for eaasy viewing in software players. No quality loss! Stereo and 5.1 sound.
